metadata.title: CVE-2015-7724 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: AMD fglrx-driver before 15.9 allows local users to gain privileges via asymlink attack.  NOTE: This vulnerability exists due to an incomplete fixfor CVE-2015-7723.

criterions.comment: fglrx-installer: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
